scripts.start: mkdirp db && cross-env SERVER=http://localhost:3000 cross-env PORT=4000 cross-env BASE_PATH=kcal-app node src/index
scripts.deploy: docker run --name Kcal-App-Backend-V1.5 -d -e SERVER='https://devbysp.github.io' -e PORT='443' -e BASE_PATH='kcal-app' -p 3200:443 devbysp/kcal-app-backend:1.5
